header.author: John Taylor
header.title: An Account OF THE MECHANISM OF THE EYE. Wherein its Power of Refracting the Rays of LIGHT, and Causing them to Coverge at the RETINA, is Consider'd: With an Endeavour to ascertain the true Place of a CATARACT, and to shew the good or ill Consequences of a Judicious or Injudicious REMOVAL of it.
